website_summaries.verdict: Fits in your pocket and functions so you know to take your pills, without everyone else knowing.
pros: One of the smallest, yet most effective medication reminders
Can switch from military time to regular time
A completely customizable alarm that you control, including the sound options
Simple to set up for those with elderly people in their lives
cons: Some customers noted the device stops working after only 5 months

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who has to take many pills a day. We tried another brand first, but it was total junk. This one isn't too difficult to set. It's loud enough, unlike the previous brand, and the vibration is strong and works great. We both love this one and my husband is lost without it. I ordered a second one to have on hand in case he loses this one or something happens to it. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: GravelGertie

customer_reviews.title: I had experienced a defect in the alarms ability to keep correct time.
customer_reviews.text: This alarm is a great idea and was hopeful for it. The alarm worked as described for the first couple of days. Then a week later i wanted to switch the alert to just vibrate. Then as i checked the time a couple hours later, the time completely changed! I had tested this for my mother to use for her medicines in which she is on a strict timw schedule. I am glad i got to test this before giving it to my mom. The product needs to fixed for this is a dangerous defect especially for people who rely on it for medicinal intake. The customer service on the other hand was great.
customer_reviews.author: Jayson

customer_reviews.title: Was Wonderful then lost time
customer_reviews.text: This pill alarm was fantastic for about 2 weeks. Then it started loosing time. I changed out batteries hoping it would fix the problem but still not working properly. I am going to try to contact company. I'm willing to give it a chance if they can fix it. When it worked it was exactly what we needed. Will update if thighs change.
customer_reviews.author: Renee S

customer_reviews.title: Small 4 Dose Med Alarm--EASY-TO-USE
customer_reviews.text: Simple to operate. Compact. I take 6 pills in the AM and it holds them all, depending on the size. Would give it a higher rating, but pill compartments close with the same plastic flap as most pill boxes, so in a crowded purse, the compartments may come open. I have had to dump my purse to retrieve a couple doses that fell out.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Ohio

customer_reviews.title: It works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I so like the e-pill Organizer,it took me a little time to figure how to set it up.. I guess I was looking for a conformation saying I had done it right. After I thought I had it set up correctly I took it for a test run, hooray it worked. I only use for one time in the afternoon same time every day, you can set other time also after it goes off it resets it's self for the same time the next day. I does work as advertised. I like it !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: FGG, Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It arrived and the display would not work unless I squeeze the pill box. As soon as I let go it turns off. The alarm did not work because the display doesn't stay on. I will be returning this asap as it's mostly useless. One if the pill compartments is loose as well and easily pops open.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: This timer worked great for two weeks after the return date expired and it quit completely. Although it had been a couple months I replaced the batteries just in case it still doesn’t work. I would not recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Fulfills Essential Medication Needs
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a medical condition that requires medication 5 times each day. This is the best product I have found to assist him to take his medications timely which is a necessity for his life. If I could find one that had 5 alarm settings that would be outstanding. Great value for what is does
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Great Pill Minder
customer_reviews.text: This Pill Box Organizer is great. I just put my prescription meds in the holders every night before bed and it's all set. This is so easy to set up. I got a second one that is harder to set up so haven't done it. Plus, all the batteries come with this one which was great. I have mine set on Vibrate and it definitely gets your attention even when I'm asleep. I put it under my pillow and it vibrates so loud, it wakes me up. The rest of the time, I keep it in my pocket. It's a great unit and so easy to use. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JadzeaTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, only design flaw is the battery you do have to put something inside the case to hold the small batteries in place or the clock will stop...I tried the rubber band trick and that didn't hold so I just added a few pieces of tape...I would have given it 5 stars if not for that small flaw.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINE BACHAND

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: It's sooo cheap. It didn't work half the time because the batteries were too loose to stay in to keep it on. It's ridiculous. My phone is more reliable. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ryan

customer_reviews.title: life would be harder without the e-pill reminder!
customer_reviews.text: this is our third purchase of the 4 alarm pill box, not because it doesn't work, but because we work it to death! my husband couldn't be without his e-pill reminder and it releases me from having to keep track of his medications. it works just wonderfully and accurately and through battery change after change. they pretty much only need replacement bacause my husband drops them, or lets them vibrate off a table too often before he gets to them. when friends have seen it they always ask about it and say how they could use one. we heartily recommend the e-pill reminder.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Never Worked
customer_reviews.text: This product never worked, not even once. It keeps time fine, but when it was time for the alarm to go off, the screen would just flash the pill icon and would neither vibrate or beep. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Use a cell phone alarm instead@
customer_reviews.text: Initially and for about 2 months it worked well and the alarm went off 3 x day for pill reminder. Now only the last reminder works. 😔
customer_reviews.author: S. Middendorf

customer_reviews.title: Pocket sized Rx pill box w/ alarm works well
customer_reviews.text: Second purchase of this item for a family member --- worth the money for the convenience.
customer_reviews.author: TrapperOne

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was hard to remember to remind my husband to take his pills. This baby does the trick. Just load it up each day and cancel the reminders on your phone, computer, etc. It is easy to set up, but do look at the directions any way. You need to remove the battery protector in the back and there is a little trick to saving the times. Remembers times day after day after day!
customer_reviews.author: Susan H.Bush/Liberty Manuals Co.

customer_reviews.title: Handy gadget
customer_reviews.text: So far this gadget has worked out well. I only use it for one pill that I have to take at a certain time each day and it was extremely helpful while traveling. I usually keep it on vibrate; and when I go some place, carry it in my pocket when possible. Programming it was easy after I discovered "the tab" that had to be pulled.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa-Oh

customer_reviews.title: ... is dangerous in that the user interface is so bad that if you don't pay very very careful attention ...
customer_reviews.text: This device is dangerous in that the user interface is so bad that if you don't pay very very careful attention it won't remind you to take your pills. After a lot of frustration I realized that the device turns off the alarm (the little pill icon goes away) any time you change the reminder time. How any product could be released with such a fatal flaw is beyond me. Once you understand that if you test it carefully it will work and it will continue to work.
customer_reviews.author: magixman

customer_reviews.title: Pick a schedule that will be good for you.
customer_reviews.text: I love it because it reminds me to schedule my shots, pills, and eating. Before I would forget all of it until my taking was too close together or to apart.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT M HARRIS

customer_reviews.title: Once a good product...
customer_reviews.text: I had one for about 4 years and worked fine. Bought one to replace it and didnt work in setting one of the four times. Bought another to replace that one and it never worked from the get go. Once you set the timers, they wouldn't go off at the right time. Too bad, because this was once a great devise for my husbands Parkinsons daily pills.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Horrible useless product
customer_reviews.text: This is a horrible product. I suspect that most customers are older or elderly. The thing is impossible to set, and even an MIT grad, Which I am,, can’t handle it. I’m 82 with a still sharp mind.. Get rid of it you can do a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: C. Davis Fogg

customer_reviews.title: Timer solved all out pill problems!
customer_reviews.text: We use it because we are on a medication that needs to be every 12 hours with consequences for missing it more than a few minutes. The timer is great and very easy to use. We are in our 80's and we have tried several others and had to get rid of them for one reason or another, but this one is just perfect. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: SMS

customer_reviews.title: FAB-U-LOUS!
customer_reviews.text: Just LOVE THIS - It's worth every penny! My 88 year-old mom "needed help" remembering when to take her meds, and this simplifies it SO MUCH! It was pretty much self-explanatory right out of the box, and super-easy to set. We use it with 4 alarms a day. We don't store her pills in it, so I don't know how that feature works. The alarm is loud enough to wake her up when she's napping, and vibrates quite strongly, to alert those who can't hear at all. If this broke, I'd instantly order another!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie C.

customer_reviews.title: Simple to program and alarm is loud and vibrates so no reason to forget pill!
customer_reviews.text: Simple to program for 4 different times to take pills; large enough compartments to hold larger and more pills; nice size to use!
customer_reviews.author: Luther D. Moss

customer_reviews.title: just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: easy to set up. my husband takes pills @ 3 different times during the day, so watches with alarms just don't help enough. This little e-pill reminder fits the bill perfectly. small- fits in his shirt pocket. And the small containers in the back are perfect for keeping his pills @ hand. We keep it set on alarm + vibrate- unless we are someplace that it could be an annoyance- then we put it to vibrate only. Its worked perfectly-had it for about 3 weeks now.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE BEST PRODUCT!!  EXCEEDED EXPECTATIONS!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Dad who has to take medication 4 times a day. THIS IS THE BEST THING I COULD HAVE GOTTEN HIM!! We have the alarm set to beep and vibrate so there is absolutely NO WAY he would be able to not know the alarm is going off (unless he is away from the box)....even then the alarm will go off a couple more times. This will ensure my Dad gets his medication at the right time each day! I highly recommend this product, it is WONDERFUL and the 4 compartments are big enough to fit multiple pills!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicky C.

customer_reviews.title: I keep it in the house and it does fine. Not much else out there at this price ...
customer_reviews.text: This works ok and gives me the needed reminder for my wife's meds. Had to mess with the batteries a bit to keep the time displayed and it doesn't handle traveling well in a carry bag. Display lost and alarm times had to be reset. I keep it in the house and it does fine. Not much else out there at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Larry D.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with this purchase. We got it for my dad who takes pills 4 times per day. However it never worked for more than 2 alarms and then it always unprogrammed itself. The first two times we thought perhaps my Dad was pushing the wrong buttons and somehow resetting it. But after several times, we became aware that this just doesn't work. Too bad. Very disappointing!!
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader

customer_reviews.title: Good Product but the alarm stops working too quickly
customer_reviews.text: The product is actually really good when it works. It has been helpful for my aging father. BUT, it doesn't last. I've already bought three or four of them in less than a year. I put in a refund request on one of them at Amazon and never heard back from anyone concerning it. Our problem is the alarm. After a couple of months, it just quits sounding. We have replaced the battery but that doesn't help. I'd be willing to pay more for a pill reminder we can actually count on!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: function problems
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry to say that I dont write many reviews and while at first giving this item rave reviews it didn't take long for me to become disappointed in the electronic workings of this item. My mom was constantly purchasing new batteries and it working for a day and then malfunctioning again. I am hoping that I just received a defective unit as the idea was excellent. I am kind of sad to have to change my review however my mom was depending on its accuracy and I feel it failed her.
customer_reviews.author: J C

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a good value.
customer_reviews.text: A little heavier than I hoped. Great for keeping medication doses seperate and handy.
customer_reviews.author: B Mill

customer_reviews.title: All and all a good product
customer_reviews.text: I did like this product, it was really helpful, although my daughter would turn it off and still not take her meds :( but I think for most it would be extremely helpful! Like the area in back for a few days of meds if you have a small trip.
customer_reviews.author: Danelle M.

customer_reviews.title: This won't let you forget to take your pills
customer_reviews.text: Are you forgetting to take your prescription drugs on time? This not only sounds off but it vibrates and talks to you. You can set it for 4 different times a day. Keep it in your pocket and the vibration will wake you up. Easy to set.
customer_reviews.author: snowflake

customer_reviews.title: Alarm was loud enough to here
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mother in law, big issue was she can hear the alarm. Most alarm are hard to hear.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It worked great, I wish it was a little smaller so you could carry in your pocket
customer_reviews.author: DSC

customer_reviews.title: ... bought it he accidently dropped it and it was fine, it was worth
customer_reviews.text: my husband bought it he accidently dropped it and it was fine, it was worth price
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Northrop

customer_reviews.title: This product is terrible. The battery always needs replacing and it doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrible. The battery always needs replacing and it doesn't keep accurate time. Sometimes the alarm goes off at the right time and sometimes it doesn't. I bought this for my Mom and the only redeeming factor is that now she thinks and worries about whether the alarm will go off or not so much, that she is remembering to take her pills. I'm looking for a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: I chose to buy this box over the other alarmed pill box sold on Amazon because of its superior features. It is quick and easy to
customer_reviews.text: Recently I purchased my second pill box organizer. Unfortunately, it arrived defective. I was very impressed with the company's quick response and replacement of the pill box. I chose to buy this box over the other alarmed pill box sold on Amazon because of its superior features. It is quick and easy to set. The alarm is easily turned on or off without having to completely reset the alarm. And it is more compact. I expect to purchase it yet again when this one wears out in a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: This is not the first one I've purchased and I really love it. I love that it has so many different times that I can set the alarms for which works really well for me with the different medications I take.
customer_reviews.author: Rae P.

customer_reviews.title: Fits nicely in a shirt pocket
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saver for me as a caretaker, it allows my husband with Parkinson's some independence. He needs to take medication throughout the day and this container allows me to set it for the correct times and refill it nightly. He can then take his medication wherever he may be during the day. Fits nicely in a shirt pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Debra J. Gooch

customer_reviews.title: Makes too much noise
customer_reviews.text: This is larger than ideal for easy carrying, but what is worse, when it is set to vibrate only it still makes a loud noise when it alerts you to take pill. It should be silent and only vibrate. That is the point. There are plenty that make noises. This was supposed to have vibrate only setting. It does not.
customer_reviews.author: Helen L.

customer_reviews.title: accuracy was great!
customer_reviews.text: accurate timing and place to hold pills, so you are good for the day even if you leave home
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Broken.
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes it! Wish it had a switch so it didn't ring if you take the pill before it goes off, as he has to take one at 4:30 a.m. 2 1/2 months later. The alarm does not work but the clock does. A real Bummer. My husband wants another one but I will check out other brands first. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: judie

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this
customer_reviews.text: I treated it with carefully but the clock keeps stopping so it's not dependable at all. Replaced all the batteries but that made no difference. It started doing that 3 weeks after I started using it. Not a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H. Giles

customer_reviews.title: Love It!--Pocket Sized--Vibrate/Beep--Simple.
customer_reviews.text: Simple to set up! Fits easily into a pocket. Alarm options include beep and vibrate. Can be carried anywhere. **A great tool for the hearing impaired and those who need organizational reminders.** NOTE: Remove the plastic strip from the battery
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 4 time a day pill takers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for 4 time a day pill takers as long as you don't take multiple large pills. I use mine for just 2 of my meds that have to be taken 4 times a day as I normally forget to take at least one of the doses. This product has made sure I don't miss a single dose and was super easy to set the 4 alarms.
customer_reviews.author: T. Gauss

customer_reviews.title: This little box is a godsend for remembering pills that ...
customer_reviews.text: This little box is a godsend for remembering pills that must be taken every three hours! However, if it is sitting on a hard surface, it will jolt itself back to the default settings of 12:00 a.m. When it goes off.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for  people who have to take meds at specific time each day.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great device to remind you to take medication. I have to take meds 3 times a day, at the exact time each day. The four alarms are easy to set. Each one can be set to beep, to vibrate, to both beep and vibrate or do nothing. It is loud enough to wake me up if its on my night table. The vibration can be felt in your pocket and it is loud enough for me to hear from the next room. It is easy to carry in your pocket and the compartments in the back hold your medication. It's a great device and it really does the job.
customer_reviews.author: JSC

customer_reviews.title: Second One That Didn't Work
customer_reviews.text: My mother-in-law had a similar model and used it for a long time. So we purchased this model and it just didn't work. We could not get anything to work, and same thing with another we bought somewhere else. Piece of crap!!
customer_reviews.author: E. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea, fails within 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product however the covers over each pill compartment break off too easily and the clock stops working within six months. Conceptually it's a great idea. I wish someone would make one that lasts much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: Came with dead batteries. Replaced them and it still will not maintain time or alarms. Very disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Childs

customer_reviews.title: love the concept and thought it would be great for ...
customer_reviews.text: love the concept and thought it would be great for my mother. We set the time and the alarms and it would work once or twice and then re-set the time on it's own. I figured we got a defective one so I ordered another because my mother thought it would be so great if it worked. We set the time and alarms on the second one and it did the same thing. I had my sister in law and brother set it just to make sure we weren't doing anything wrong and it still didn't work. Very, very disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Item defective
customer_reviews.text: Item came with lid on number 1 box that won’t close.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Athens

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 92 year old father. I did set it up for him because his eyesight isn't that great. But it's been working like a charm. All he has to do is press one button to shut off the notification.
customer_reviews.author: Nora Charles

customer_reviews.title: Untrustworthy
customer_reviews.text: First pill box came and did not work, at all. Couldn't even set the time. Returned it and got another. This one works intermittently. Will alarm appropriately for few days, then all of the numbers disappear and the time of day has to be reset as well as the pill alarm time. Again, will work for a time or two and then things go dark again. All this while the box is just siting on table, not being jostled in a pocket or purse. I guess I will continue the search.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L Ray

customer_reviews.title: Grrrreat!
customer_reviews.text: Even though this lives deep in my hand bag, it projects so well that I can hear in other room. No worries.. you will not miss another pill if you buy this! I also took advice of other reviewer and put rubber band on battery cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First bad review written on an Amazon purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very unhappy with this product!!! Some how it manages to reset the current time with all the medication times. It does this often. The alarm and vibration are so loud and disturbing at my place of. Sadly I have given up on it! I was looking forward to using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Parkw

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good pill box for people who have multiple pills to take at each meal. It also has a little more weight so will stay put in a man's pants pocket better than the lighter-weight containers.
customer_reviews.author: Jane B.

customer_reviews.title: The idea is good but the performance is very poor
customer_reviews.text: The idea is good but the performance is very poor. Bought one Sept. 2014 and it's one of the worse gadget I have ever purchase, it's timer is very unstable and it is constantly running out of battery.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Ocana

customer_reviews.title: alarms not adequate
customer_reviews.text: The alarms are not strong enough. I did not hear the sound alarm and I did not feel the vibration alarm (It was in my pocket.).
customer_reviews.author: Prudence

customer_reviews.title: So far both boxes, my wife's white one and ...
customer_reviews.text: So far both boxes, my wife's white one and my black one are performing just as they are expected to do. We use them for reminder of time of medication and time of eye drops. Richard and Florence Gartee
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pill Box
customer_reviews.text: The first one we got did not work, so returned it. The second one worked really well. It comes in handy as a reminder when you have lots of medications to take. Its a little large to carry in a pocket but can be carried in a purse.
customer_reviews.author: John L. Hix  Jo Hix

customer_reviews.title: I don't like all the preset times
customer_reviews.text: Confusing to operate, I shouldn't have to read the directions every time I use it. I don't like all the preset times, would rather set my own alarm time.
customer_reviews.author: mtntopmaggie

customer_reviews.title: This medication timer worked very well during the first set ...
customer_reviews.text: This medication timer worked very well during the first set of batteries. After the batteries were replaced with the proper type, the unit failed to ring or vibrate when it was supposed to. It became totally undependable.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great solution . . .
customer_reviews.text: to the challenge of taking the right pill at the right time. Easy to place the pills in the back storage compartment when out of the house. Alarm sound plus vibration provide great options. These pill boxes are pretty reliable and well made, but if used daily, they will last only a few years. Guess that's okay--they're not very expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: headline response
customer_reviews.text: it is for my dad, 82 years old. the multi alarms is great for him taking care of his bladder bag. However, I was disappointed that the batteries didn't work in one of them. I sent an email to ask if new batteries could be sent and the reply was the whole thing had to be returned. Really..... We used batteries from a past one we ordered that has a number of hours on the batteries. This sounded easier than returning with postage costs. If you can do anything to assist in this area, if would be greatly appreciated
customer_reviews.author: cathy a michal

customer_reviews.title: That was a real problem as my memory is not great at 82 yrs
customer_reviews.text: Use it daily as it sure help[s remind me of when to take my pills. That was a real problem as my memory is not great at 82 yrs. old. Thank you, Nan Vogee
customer_reviews.author: jack m vogee

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I never forget my pills these days especially when I'm involved in talking with my friends -- which is when I used to forget my meds!
customer_reviews.author: Toni in Cinci

customer_reviews.title: Vibrate and Alarm feature. I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to program, and it has a vibrate and alarm which you will not miss. I hear it even if I am in the other side of my home :-) I love it!
customer_reviews.author: A Huttenbrauck

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for med reminders.
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. The mechanism to open for batteries is a little difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this little gadget
customer_reviews.text: I am now able to take my pills on time every day without missing one or taking any one of them late. Love this little gadget.
customer_reviews.author: Ciaran Mackay

customer_reviews.title: y
customer_reviews.text: In pocket or headboard of bed, never tried any similar device, have to use vibrator as tone not loud enough and using only 3 compartment as one opens d umping pills in pocket on occasion. Not suitable for people with hearing loss, unless they can use vibrator. I find that it works well for me by using vibrate on a hard surface or in pocket. I use three compartments with success. Overall very helpful to me. Investigation of compartment failure seems logical.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: This particular alarm box didnt meet our needs. It wasn't used. My husband has had several similar to this but this one didn't match up.
customer_reviews.author: Gingerbread

customer_reviews.title: Keeps resetting. keeps changing set time. the first ...
customer_reviews.text: Keeps resetting. keeps changing set time. the first one worked for a year till it got wet. this new one s****!
customer_reviews.author: W. Aher

customer_reviews.title: The e-pill works great! It is exactly what I needed to get ...
customer_reviews.text: The e-pill works great! It is exactly what I needed to get my medicine on time. The alarm is loud enough I can hear it any where in my little house. I am totally pleased with it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Deenie S

customer_reviews.title: Bad electronics
customer_reviews.text: This pill reminder seemed OK at first but within a week it was re-setting the time of day, losing the pill reminders and quickly became totally non-functional. The time of day couldn't be set - it would keep flashing and beeping. One star only because it seems like a good idea and would have served our purposes as a reminder - if it only worked properly.
customer_reviews.author: kaysea

customer_reviews.title: Handy but boxes are small.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nifty little gadget, but for an elderly person who is on a lot of meds (the intended recipient), the boxes are too small.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Gal

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work. Not worth the price even as cheap as it was. Don't even bother. Wanted this to help my husband with his parkinsons MEDS so it needed to be simple. It changed the settings independently and caused more stress.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps as a reminder when awake it is adequate but vibration not strong enough to wake me.
customer_reviews.author: senior

customer_reviews.title: This alarm works!
customer_reviews.text: This alarm is fairly easy to set up, and it works well as a reminder of pill time. Its nice not to have to remember to "turn it on" every day.
customer_reviews.author: D. Link

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Because this item was exactly what was described. Easy to set alarms and there is lots of space for the pills.I bought this for my five year old that needs to take medication and this pill box holder helps teach him how to be independent.Also a nice feature is the pool box is numbered although it's a little faint but it worked out! The option for beep or vibrate is nice too in case you are in a quiet place.
customer_reviews.author: lakesha lee

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend it to anyone who has to take medication on ...
customer_reviews.text: It exceeded expectations. I highly recommend it to anyone who has to take medication on a daily schedule. I use a second timer as a reminder for appointments, etc. of a non medical nature.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Did not work . I bought two if these and neither one worked. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Jones

customer_reviews.title: Pill reminder
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that would remind my dad age 89 to take his pain meds every 4-6 six hours. It took me a while to figure this out as the directions seemed to be missing something since this is for someone with short term memory issues. (Not me) This seems to be the best I could find it would be great to have one where you could push reset button and it automatically goes another 4 hours
customer_reviews.author: Smiledoc

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift and did not use myself, I assume it is okay.
customer_reviews.author: v. putin

customer_reviews.title: Was able to set for 4 day medication, selected ...
customer_reviews.text: Was able to set for 4 day medication, selected “ring” over “vibrate.” NONE of the alarms rang. Unsatisfactory product for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi G

customer_reviews.title: Two days and it needed a new battery
customer_reviews.text: Within two days it stopped working. I put in a new battery and now it is working again.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: it works perfect. I really love it
customer_reviews.text: it works perfect. I really love it , my mother used to forget when to take her pills not anymore . excellent !
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Largaespada

customer_reviews.title: and the delivery speed was amazing. I felt I got a really good deal ...
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I had been looking for, and the delivery speed was amazing. I felt I got a really good deal since I had seen the same item elsewhere for twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: mulberrymagpie

customer_reviews.title: the one that you sent did not operate properly - ...
customer_reviews.text: the one that you sent did not operate properly - it never showed the time or the alarm times - I changed the batteries, cleaned the connections,...everything the makers said to try - it DID NOT WORK
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Dicey!
customer_reviews.text: It's okay when it works - it's on trial today after failing for 2 days!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Onyemelukwe

customer_reviews.title: doesn't like to be dropped on floor
customer_reviews.text: Works well most of time, doesn't like to be dropped on floor. Has been intermitent since being dropped.Occasonaly doesn't sound even when set. properly, Perhaps case could be hardened or cusioned to survive falls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one month
customer_reviews.text: Worked great but stopped working after just 1 month! Specifically, I can't set the time anymore, the buttons don't work. Going to contact the seller to see if they'll offer a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca Gessner

customer_reviews.title: Very good reminder
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband. It is a very good reminder if you have to take medication at certain times, several times a day. It beeps and vibrates, so also very good for people who are hard of hearing and can't hear the beep.
customer_reviews.author: Lili

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool. Keeps me independent in my medications and assures mess are taken in a timely manner
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rating low because not what I expected - really nothing ...
customer_reviews.text: Rating low because not what I expected - really nothing wrong with it - just did not do 1/2 hour increments. I want to return it & don't know who to return it to. I destroyed outside shipping label when opening it and threw it away and there was nothing inside package. Please give me that info and I will return it.
customer_reviews.author: Alice M. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Not dependable for husband with Parkinson's.
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to set because it only reads PM but instructions say it reads AM as well. I then went ahead and programmed it, pretty straight forward, and it worked for the 1st week or so but then it only worked spasmodically. Now it doesn't buzz or vibrate at all.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia R Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: This pill box was very easy to set, clear and easy to understand. The pill pocket covers are hard to open, especially for a Parkinson's patient. The vibration/alarm is loud enough, but my loved one often gets confused when he hears this alarm (is it the stove, the alarm clock, the coffee pot...etc). I think I need to go back to the pill box with the voice.
customer_reviews.author: mabel smith

customer_reviews.title: Well done!
customer_reviews.text: This has simplified our lives. It reminds my husband when meds are needed. With the pills in he same case we can be sure that they have been taken. Fits easily in a pocket. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Myra Kelman Hirschhorn

customer_reviews.title: great for my father in law
customer_reviews.text: he uses it every day and it works well - highly recommend this for elderly people who have to take meds and may forget to do it with out a reminder
customer_reviews.author: lady

product_meta.title: e-Pill 4 Alarm Pocket with Attached Pillbox – Vibrates and/or Beeps
feature_bullets: LOUD ALARMS: The set alarms will automatically repeat every day. The notification type can be set for vibration, beeping or both.
EASY TO SET: Slide the left switches to set alarms, and the right switch to set notification type.

PILL REMINDER: At alarm time the alarm will go off for 30 seconds. It will repeat twice if not turned off, after 4 minutes and after 8 minutes. In addition, a pill icon and the alarm number set for that time will appear on the display. The alarm number matches the numbered pillbox compartment holding the medications for that alarm (1, 2, 3 or 4). Tap the center button to silence the alarm.

ABOUT US: e-pill Medication Reminders is located in the healthcare hub of Boston Massachusetts and has been providing medication adherence solutions since 1999. All our products come with a 1-year warranty.
